title: Anniversary Message
prompt: I want to tell my partner how much they mean to me during our anniversary
description: Create a heartfelt anniversary message expressing love and appreciation

title: Post-Disagreement
prompt: I need help expressing my feelings after a disagreement with my loved one
description: Craft a sincere apology and reconciliation message

title: Wedding Vows
prompt: Help me write a romantic poem for my wedding vows
description: Compose beautiful wedding vows that express eternal love

title: Good Morning Surprise
prompt: I want to surprise my partner with a sweet good morning message
description: Create a charming good morning message to brighten their day

title: Long Distance Love
prompt: Write something to remind my long-distance partner how much I miss them
description: Express longing and commitment in a long-distance relationship

title: Romantic Evening
prompt: I want to set the mood for a romantic evening with my partner
description: Create an intimate message to enhance a romantic atmosphere

title: Daily Appreciation
prompt: How can I tell my partner I appreciate the little things they do?
description: Express gratitude for everyday acts of love and kindness

title: Supportive Message
prompt: My partner is going through a tough time and I want to offer support
description: Provide comfort and encouragement during difficult periods
